trends: There have been no other sightings in anahiem
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: circular the whole object was bright royal blue
divs: Sighting Detailson the near cross streets Beach and Lincoln in the city of Anaheim a bright royal blue the size of a helicopter but it was most defiantly not a helicopter, it was a circular shaped it didn't have individual light's, the whole object was a light it hovered up then lowered then back up again then lowered again but not as low as before and then went back up again but it kept going straight up until it was gone, it had no sound at all, at its lowest point it was as low as 200feet, when the craft left it didn't go east west north or south it left our view by leaving up-ward...didn't
